thread.title: 5 Best Things To See In Malaysia
thread.title_full: 5 Best Things To See In Malaysia

author: admin
title: 5 Best Things To See In Malaysia
text:
Home > Travel Destinations > 5 Best Things To See In Malaysia 5 Best Things To See In Malaysia By admin on September 3, 2015 Pin It 
Malaysia is a culturally rich and a friendly nation. It is comfortable and modern but at the same time it has also been successful in retaining its ecological beauty. 
This country is basically a mix of Indian, Arabic, Chinese, Malay, Peranakan and European cultures with its landscapes dotes with churches, mosques and temples. 
The most important thing about Malaysia is that it possesses some world famous attractions making the trip to this nation immeasurably rewarding. Best Things to See in Malaysia During Your Visit 
Some of the best things to see in Malaysia during your visit are included below: Petronas Twin Towers 
Petronas Twin Towers were acknowledged as the tallest buildings in the world when their construction work was completed in the year 1998. These twin towers are positioned centrally in Kuala Lumpur and they contain conference halls, office buildings, 50 acre park and even an up market shopping area. Malaaca City 
This is one of the most populat tourist attractions in Malaysia. This city is locally known as Bandaraya Melaka. This is a historical and one of the oldest cities in Malaysia, which is listed as UNESCO World Heritage Site. 
Recently, the entire city has been renovated and improvised and is fat being promoted as the top pick holiday destination in Malaysia because of its innumerable historic attractions. George Town 
George Town has been named after George III, the King of Britain and is positioned in the north-east corner of the famous Penang Island. This is another city along with Malaaca is list as UNESCO World Heritage Site. 
Here, you can get the sight of colonial-era shop houses. The city is well-known for its exclusive cultural and architectural townscape. These are some of the best things to see in Malaysia. Langkawi 
This is a tropical island in Malaysia and it is also ranks among the most beautiful islands in the world. This place is officially known as Langkawi the Jewel of Kedah. You can visit this island for fantastic sightseeing, beautiful beaches and wonderful jungles. Cameron Highlands 
This is an extensive hill station in Malaysia with a population of over 34,000 people. This highland is very popular for the trails that it possesses. These trails lead the tourists through the beautiful forest to the waterfalls and various other serene spots.
